text: Speaking her truth. Nicole Kidman opened up about the miscarriages she suffered during her marriage to Tom Cruise in a candid new interview. The Big Little Lies star, 50, understandably felt “ massive grief ” upon miscarrying at 23 shortly after her 1990 wedding to Cruise due to an ectopic pregnancy, a condition in which the embryo begins developing in the fallopian tube rather than in the womb. “ There ’ s a huge, aching yearning. I know the yearning, ” Kidman told Talter magazine while covering their July 2018 issue. “ And the loss! The loss of a miscarriage is not talked about enough.
